law.catch_line: Condemnation by county judge/executive for road purposes.
law.text: When any county judge/executive desires to condemn land under the authority of KRS 178.110, the county judge/executive shall proceed pursuant to the Eminent Domain Act of Kentucky.
law.history: Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 384, sec. 521, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 140, sec. 120. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4302.
